transcript.sentence: The trailer begins with a view of the new york skyline.
Cars explode in the street.
Uniform soldiers start shooting. Police officers start shooting.
A man is sitting in a dark metal room holding a sky.
Car explodes in the street and pedestrians run away.
A helicopter lands.
A man wearing an eyepatch talks in a walkie talkie.
Marvel
paramount.
A group of men and a woman walked through a metal door.
Captain America looks at a suit.
Thoreau lives up his hammer.
The hook walks in a room.
The black widow stairs down.
Hot guy shoots an arrow.
Our man flies through the new york skyline.
The heroes change into their uniforms.
Nick furry picks up a gun and shoots.
Captain America, hawkeye and black widow show off their signature moves.
This may.
A man is thrown out of the window and into the car.
I am a man shoots up into the air and towards the new york skyline.
Marvel of ventures.
Wearing formal suits, incredible hook and iron man shake hands.
The hook suddenly bursts out.
May 2012
rail d 3D.

the trailer begins with a view of the new york skyline
several cars explode in the middle of the streets
uniformed soldiers start shooting, police officers start shooting
a man (loki)  is sitting in a dark, metal room holding a scythe
there are several car explosions in the street and pedestrians run away
a helicopter lands
a man wearing an eyepatch talks in a microphone
marvel, paramount
a group of men and a woman walk through a metal door
captain america looks at his suit
thor lifts his hammer up
black widow stands in the middle of the street
iron man flies in between skyscrapers
the heros change into their uniforms
nick fury picks up a gun and shoots
there is a scene of captain america, hawkeye, black widow showing off their signature moves
this may
thor jumps on top of captain america
iron man shoots up into the air and flies to the ny skyline
marvel avengers
wearing formal suits, incredible hulk and iron man shake hands 
the hulk suddenly bursts out 
may 2012
real d 3d

result.title: Marvel's The Avengers- Trailer (OFFICIAL)
result.description: Watch the first trailer for "Marvel's The Avengers", in theaters May 4, 2012.
